channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Nicki Chapman helps a buyer with a budget of ?450,000 who wants to escape her ex-council flat in south London and create a new life in the Wiltshire countryside. She's after somewhere with a bit more space for herself and her young daughter. Taking a breather from property, Nicki also discovers why the county's chalk streams are the perfect habitat for trout when she pays a visit to a sustainable fish farm.
